original_title: Rizin World Grand Prix 2015: Part 1 - Saraba
overview: Rizin World Grand Prix 2015: Part 1 - Saraba was an inaugural mixed martial arts event held by the Rizin Fighting Federation on December 29, 2015 at the Saitama Super Arena in Saitama, Japan .
title: Rizin World Grand Prix 2015: Part 1 - Saraba
